author: henning
msg: Remove all the various webserver information member variables and
replace them with a slick ServerData structure.

author: henning
msg: An interface which bundles up all the names and values that are needed

author: henning
msg: A Facade class for the RunData Service. We didn't had one yet. The name
sucks, but all the good ones were taken.

author: henning
msg: More stuff in the cunning "we clean up the internal core structures"
checkin. This puts at least some sense to the Locale and Charset
- Factored out the property Keys for locale and charset. Put them into
TurbineConstants. Added sane default values (fixes getDefaultLocale()
returning null, which in turn removes some "== null" tests of the
- cleaned up some of the multi comment lines into one-liners.
- replaced many "== null" tests for strings with StringUtils
- reworked the getContentType() logic to be more clear (I hope)

author: henning
msg: Cleaned up the ServerData Structure, added a copy constructor and a
clone() method. This is part of a cunning plan (TM) to actually clean
up a lot of code in the Turbine core.
